isOpen.title: Open automatically
isOpen.description: Should this group be automatically opened when Terria loads?

dataCustodian.title: Data Custodian
dataCustodian.description: Markdown/text description of the custodian of this data source.

preserveOrder.title: Preserve order
preserveOrder.description: Prevent items in group being sorted. Subgroups will still sort unless their own preserveOrder flag is set.
